Imports

../core/types/texture, ../core/types/vector2, ../core/types/color, ../core/types/rect

Types

ParticleProps = object
  position*: Vector2
  velocity*, velocityVariation*: Vector2
  startColor*, endColor*: Color
  startSize*, endSize*: float
  lifeTime*: float
  lifeTimeVariation*: float
particle properties 
ParticleSystem = object
  pool: array[5000, Particle]
  idx: int
  texture*: Texture
a particle system, stores up to 5000 particles

Procs

proc draw(ps: ParticleSystem; offset: Vector2) {....raises: [], tags: [].}
draws a particle system 
proc emit(ps: var ParticleSystem; props: ParticleProps) {....raises: [], tags: [].}
creates a new particle 
proc tryEmit(ps: var ParticleSystem; props: ParticleProps) {....raises: [],
    tags: [].}
emits a particle if the next particle is free 
proc update(ps: var ParticleSystem; dt: float32) {....raises: [], tags: [].}
updates a particle system
